EmailTemplate.name: Agreement Office365 External Review Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.Name} is submitted for your review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Reviewer,
You have been requested by {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.OwnerFullName} to review the following documents via Office365 online. {{SharePointUrl}}
Please notify {!Apttus__APTS_Agreement__c.OwnerEmail} after you complete the review.
Note that the attached supporting documents are just for reference.
Thanks,
Conga CLM
